publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2771 Ms Margo MacDonald: Congratulations to Scottish Olympians—That the Parliament, on behalf of people in Scotland, congratulates Rhona Martin, Debbie Knox, Fiona MacDonald, Janice Rankin and Margaret Morton on winning the Women’s Curling Gold Medal at the Winter Olympic Games; thanks them for the quality and style of their ambassadorial role for curling and Scottish sport and sportsmanship and for their positive promotion of Scotland, and that of their team coaches, to a world-wide audience, and urges electricians’ wives everywhere to aspire to the same level of expertise and success in their chosen sport.
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Shona Robison*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Alex Fergusson*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2771 Congratulations to Scottish Olympians (lodged on 22 February 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*
